content.text:
# 14th Critics' Choice Awards

| last_link = 13th Critics' Choice Awards
| last      = 13th
| next_link = 15th Critics' Choice Awards
| next      = 15th
}}
The '''14th Critics' Choice Awards were presented on January 8, 2009, at the Santa Monica Civic Auditorium, honoring the finest achievements of 2008 filmmaking. The nominees were announced on December 9, 2008.
Winners and nominees
, Best Director winner]]
, Best Actor winner]]
, Best Actress co-winner]]
, Best Actress co-winner]]
, Best Supporting Actor winner]]
, Best Supporting Actress winner]]
, Best Young Performer winner]]

'Danny Boyle – Slumdog Millionaire'
* Christopher Nolan – The Dark Knight

* Gus Van Sant – Milk
* Ron Howard – Frost/Nixon
|-
| valign="top" width="50%" |
'Sean Penn – Milk as Harvey Milk'
* Brad Pitt – The Curious Case of Benjamin Button as Benjamin Button
* Clint Eastwood – Gran Torino as Walt Kowalski
* Frank Langella – Frost/Nixon as Richard Nixon
* Mickey Rourke – The Wrestler as Robin Ramzinski/Randy Robinson
* Richard Jenkins – The Visitor as Walter Vale
| valign="top" width="50%" |

| valign="top" width="50%" |
